column3: Latest;Kampong Chhnang: 27------ python------s were released into the wild in a cooperation between the Forestry Administration and the Gendarmerie.------The snakes were set free in the evening of November 7
column7: Kampong Chhnang Province.------The 27 pythons had been collected in Phnom Penh and from wildlife traders
column8: said an official.------Environmental officials have called on citizens not to clear flooded habitats and not to hunt wildlife. ------RASMEI KAMPUCHEA
